questions.question: What is the main advantage of using M-ary PSK over BPSK?

explanations.c: Correct. M-ary PSK increases bandwidth efficiency by transmitting multiple bits per symbol.

questions.question: In 16PSK modulation, how many distinct phase states are used?

explanations.d: Correct. 16PSK uses 16 different phase shifts to represent 4-bit symbols.

questions.question: Which factor significantly affects the Bit Error Rate (BER) in M-ary PSK systems?

explanations.c: Correct. BER in PSK systems is heavily influenced by the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR). Lower SNR results in higher BER.
